description: Created [Product](https://docs.thirdfi.org/product/overview) and [API Documentations](https://thirdfi.readme.io/reference/introduction) for ThirdFi and created Sample apps.
Wrote multiple [Getting Started](https://www.blog.thirdfi.org/) blogs on Blockchain topics and API usage.
Delivered web3 workshop on multiple Discord servers including one on LearnWeb3 discord.
Contributed to the successful launch of DEX (DerpDEX) on zkSync and Base chain.
Developed comprehensive Getting Started, Protocol, and Product Docs for DerpDEX with Gitbook.
Teaching blockchain concepts through videos on BlockTrain’s [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/Blocktrain).
Hosting meetups in colleges in India.
Building projects with BlockTrain’s for workshops.
Have organized API HACKS 2 that helped a lot of beginners to get into development.
It was all about development, growth and API's.
Managed to do workshops on Tech Phantom's Youtube and bring value to all the hackers.
Increased engagement on Prepbyte’s coding challenges and workshops.
Have collaborated with a student community to leverage students with coding and development.
Hosted a successful coding contest with 700+ registrations.
Engaged with community members and helped them upgrade their skills.
